Bespoke Magento eCommerce
for unique business needs.

That’s our speciality. We use design and technology to create tailored shopping experiences that’ll excite your customers and perform for your brand. See the results for yourself…

  • Evolutionary eCommerce for revolutionary furniture.

    Swoon Editions was founded to make beautiful furniture more affordable. We’ve been there from the start, adapting our processes as their business has evolved and iterating the store over four years to achieve annual growth.

    • 34% higher conversion
    • 170% more sales
    • 272% more mobile

  • Getting integrated with bricks and mortar.

    Selco are a national builders merchant. They needed an online presence that integrated with real-world operations, so we worked closely with their teams on ERM integration, send-to-store and responsive access for builders on the go.

    • 100% more traffic
    • 5k user projects
    • 56% mobile usage

  • Responsive websites for a world of fanatics.

    Absolute Skateboards is home to some surf and skate’s biggest brands. First we improved speed and stability on their multi-brand, multi-region platform, then we rolled out responsive stores for their young, mobile customers.

    • 13 global stores
    • 26% higher conversion
    • 10% more mobile

  • Reaping the fruits of a long-term partnership.

    Sunspel have produced luxury everyday clothing since 1860. Working together for four years, we’ve refined the store’s brand experience and marketing integration to maintain double-digit growth and build a loyal customer base.

    • 17% more sales
    • 19% higher conversion
    • 2x mobile sales

  • Our time-saving tool for fellow web developers.

    Browsersync is an open source project for syncronised browser testing. For the past two years, we’ve been adding new features and providing support, earning legions of users and a Netmag award nomination in the process.

    • 200k monthly downloads
    • 100+ feature updates
    • 1,360 code commits
/ 5

We’re a powerful team with a simple approach.

  • Learn

    We immerse ourselves in our client’s world to understand exactly what they need to gain a competitive advantage. Whether that’s tangible improvements in ROI, or softer, less tangible refinement of their presentation in the marketplace.

  • Craft

    We treat each project as a unique challenge; turning what we learn into a set of tailored, practical solutions that target objectives. We also adapt our process to work effectively and efficiently with each client and service partners.

  • Grow

    Lasting relationships are the key to adding value and delivering consistent results. We help our clients achieve their long-term ambitions by integrating ourselves into their operations, acting more like an invested internal team than an external supplier.

We squeeze the most from Magento.

JH has been a Magento Silver Solution Partner since the scheme’s inception. Our long-standing experience with Magento Enterprise Edition is fortified by the official Magento Certified qualification held by every JH developer. This foundation of expertise is complemented by specialist eCommerce capabilities that add value to every project:

  • eCommerce strategy
  • Brand experience
  • Responsive design
  • Site optimisation
  • ERM integration
  • Platform migration

Work with JH.
